pages.pageprocessor:
function pageprocessorNews(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$.blockUI();var feed = new google.feeds.Feed(pagedef.url);feed.setNumEntries(-1);feed.setResultFormat(google.feeds.Feed.JSON);feed.load(function(result) {if(!result.error) {$scope.feeds=result.feed.entries;$rootScope.feeds = result.feed.entries;var data = '
';data = $(data).append($(pagedef.datatemplate));var data1 = $compile($(data))($scope);$('#appContent').append(data1);$scope.$apply();$.unblockUI();}});}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorVideos(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { $.blockUI();$http.get(pagedef.url).success( function(data) {$scope.videos = data.feed.entry;$rootScope.videos = data.feed.entry;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$.unblockUI();}).error ( function(data) {$.unblockUI();});}

pages.datatemplate:
{{title}}

{{description}}
pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorVideosVideosDetails(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope,$sce, $window, $location) { var video = $rootScope.videos[$routeParams.index];$scope.video = video; $scope.title=video.title.$t;var temp = video.id.$t;var tempId = temp.substring(temp.lastIndexOf("/") + 1);$scope.id = tempId;$scope.trustSrc = function() {return $sce.trustAsResourceUrl("http://www.youtube.com/embed/" + tempId);};$scope.description=video.media$group.media$description.$t;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorLibrary6(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) { if(window.device){$.blockUI();} var iabRef = window.open(pagedef.url, "_blank", "location=no,hidden=yes");var hideBlockUi = function() {iabRef.show();$.unblockUI();};var iabClose = function(data) {window.location.href = "index.html#home";};iabRef.addEventListener("exit", iabClose);var loadStop = function(data) {hideBlockUi();  };iabRef.addEventListener("loadstop", loadStop);}

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorCourses(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {$scope.resultfound = true;var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);$scope.fetched = false;$scope.filterresult = function() {var searchTxt = $("#Coursestxt").val();$rootScope.Coursesval = searchTxt;var results = [];var patt = new RegExp(searchTxt, "i");var filterParams = pagedef.searchfields.split(",");$.each($scope.CoursesList.ROW, function(index, val){var found=false;for(var i=0;i<filterParams.length;i++) {if(val[ "" + filterParams[i] + ""].match(patt)) {found=true;break;}}if(found) {results.push(val);}});$rootScope.CoursesResult = results;if(results.length > 0) {$scope.resultfound = true;}else {$scope.resultfound = false;}   };$scope.search = function() {if($scope.fetched == false) {$.blockUI();var url = pagedef.url;if(window.device) {}else {url = "/websimulator/xml?url=" + pagedef.url;}var xhr=$.ajax({url: url,dataType:"xml",async:true,data:{},success: function(resp){try {var results = $.xml2json(resp);$scope.fetched = true;$scope.CoursesList = results;$scope.filterresult();$scope.$apply();$.unblockUI();}catch(E) {alert ("Exception : " + E);}},error: function(e) {alert ("Error : " + e);$.unblockUI();apprise("Error occured. Please try again later.", {"verify":false, "textYes":"Ok"}, function(r) {$window.history.back();});}});}else {$scope.filterresult();}}}
